about_the_game:
The Tower of Whispers is a rogue-lite hack-and-slash dungeon crawler where you fight your way through the tower, with each floor more treacherous than the last, to harness its powers and unveil its secrets.


Experience thrilling isometric combat, engaging rogue-lite gameplay, and extensive build customization. Delve into the bowels of the tower, where each floor poses new challenges and hidden treasures. Discover a myriad of items that will not only aid you in battle but also allow you to tailor your character's abilities and playstyle.

Unveil the tower's Secrets

Explore the floors of the Tower of Whispers and learn to wield its not-so-chaotic nature to your advantage.

The flow of time itself is convoluted; with heroes centuries old phasing in and out

Experience the tower through the eyes of different heroes. Dash and slash your enemies with the thorned knight, Electrocute them from afar with the storm wielder, drag them down to the deepest depths with the sea hunter, and many more to be discovered.

Seek help from the past... or the future

Make use of the dearest objects left behind by other heroes lost to the treacherous tower and infuse mementos into these relics to make them even more powerful.

There's as many stories as lost souls in this Tower

Discover the stories of the souls trapped within the tower and its mysterious servants that inhabit it. Each relic is filled with extensive lore about the tower, its origins, and purpose.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 (3.3 GHz)/AMD FX-4100 (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)/AMD FX-8350 (4.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 760/Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
